type.description: Type of beneficiary ie NEFT or IMPS or ZETA

code.description: Code given to a transaction policy

coaID.description: Coa ID of issuer to which the transaction policy would be associated

transactionConstraints.description: Transaction Constraints containing allowed/disallowed transaction categories and time slices

transactionRules.description: Transaction rules to be applied on a particular posting

balanceRules.description: Balance rules to be applied either on transacting account or group of accounts of account holder based on applicability criteria and policy scope

aggregateRules.description: Aggregate rules (daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly) to be applied based on applicability criteria and transaction category

effectiveFrom.description: Effective date (epoch time in milliseconds) from when the transaction policy will be applied

expiresAt.description: Expiry date (epoch time in milliseconds) for the transaction policy post which it will not be applied

accountsApplicableTo.description: Applicability or Filtering Criteria to pick account[s] of the account holder
